text_content: Triangle compression is doing its job, and the next break should set the tone for the next leg around $HYPE   Direction will likely hinge on where liquidity gets taken first: upside favors continuation momentum, while a downside break points to a deeper reset before any trend resumes. #Altcoin Season#  #BTC Price Analysis#  #Macro Insights#

Turtle is integrating @MezoNetwork.

A Bitcoin-first onchain bank, starting with a unified liquidity hub to borrow, earn, and deploy BTC without selling it.

Mezo opportunities are now live on Turtle. 
2/ What @MezoNetwork is building

Mezo addresses a core gap in Bitcoin onchain markets:
native infrastructure to borrow, earn, and deploy BTC while staying long.

The stack aggregates BTC-backed credit, yield, and liquidity into a single system.
3/ Mezo is raising liquidity across two vaults:

‚Ä¢ BTC Vault: tBTC, cbBTC, wBTC
‚Ä¢ Stablecoin Vault: MUSD, USDC, USDT

Total capacity across both vaults: $5M
Incentive duration: 3 months 
4/ BTC Vault mechanics

BTC variants are pooled into a tri-asset liquidity position on Ethereum.

LPs earn:
‚Ä¢ 2‚Äì3% base yield from lending & borrowing activity
‚Ä¢ Additional yield from Mezo token emissions

Target total yield: ~34%  APR 
5/ Stablecoin Vault mechanics

Stablecoins are deployed across onchain strategies on Ethereum, Base, and Mezo.

Yield sources include:
‚Ä¢ Native DeFi strategies
‚Ä¢ Basis trading on perpetual venues (e.g. Lighter, Hyperliquid)

Base yield: 5‚Äì10%
Target total yield: 37~42% 
6/ Incentive structure

‚Ä¢ Incentives funded via Mezo governance token emissions
‚Ä¢ Fixed-rate targets for both BTC and stablecoin vaults
‚Ä¢ Incentives apply until vault capacity is filled

Rewards are claimable as veMEZO at vault unlock, with a 3-month vote-lock. Rewards distributed each epoch thereafter are liquid.
7/ @MezoNetwork is now live on Turtle.

Deploy BTC or stablecoins into a fixed-rate, capacity-capped opportunity backed by native Bitcoin infrastructure.

Deposit here: https://app.turtle.xyz/earn/products/a8b92881-685e-4f91-8ee5-3a5eb7f26554

üêâ Dragonfly Capital just pulled 25,989.71 $HYPE  ($648.6K) from Bybit into self‚Äëcustody, signaling entity‚Äëlevel conviction but not a market‚Äëwide accumulation trend. Price keeps slipping and no broader follow‚Äëthrough yet‚Äîmore selective positioning than a bullish wave. #Hyperliquid #HYPE  #Crypto

Analyzing the $HYPE /USDT 4-hour chart, we can observe that the price has been moving in a range between 24.00 and 25.60 after a significant drop, showing a phase of consolidation. The price has recently bounced off support around the 24.00 level, signaling potential bullish momentum. The moving averages are converging, which suggests the market is in a neutral stance, but a break above the current range could signal a bullish move.  The RSI is currently around 50, indicating indecision, with no clear overbought or oversold conditions. This neutral reading suggests the market is waiting for a catalyst, either a breakout above 25.60 to drive the price higher, or a break below 24.00 to test lower support levels.  Keep an eye on the resistance at 25.60‚Äîwill the price push through, or will it fail and continue to consolidate?  #BingX  #CryptoAnalysis  #HYPE

$HYPE  HOLDS LOWER CHANNEL SUPPORT  Hyperliquid continues to trade inside a falling channel, stabilizing near the lower boundary after a prolonged decline. Repeated consolidation and triangle formations suggest pressure is building, but price remains capped below descending resistance. Holding support could trigger a corrective bounce, while a breakdown would expose fresh downside.  More forecasts üëâ https://bit.ly/detraders   #HYPE  #Hyperliquid  #HYPE Price Analysis#

On the 4H, $HYPE  is still in a clear downtrend and keeps getting smacked at the trendline. That said, the selling pressure looks like it‚Äôs easing, price isn‚Äôt dumping anymore, it‚Äôs starting to chop sideways.  On the higher timeframe, we‚Äôre coming into a big macro support/resistance zone around the 0.75 level. HYPE‚Äôs been lagging compared to the rest of the market, but that‚Äôs usually how snapback moves start.  If this base keeps building, I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised to see HYPE reclaim $30 sooner rather than later. Ôªø#Altcoin Season#  #HYPE  #Macro Insights#
